Winston-Salem.Joseph Franklin Bland House:
The Joseph Franklin Bland House (also known as the Franklin Bland House and "The Castle") is a historic house located at Winston-Salem, Forsyth County, North Carolina.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1936, and is a 1-1/2 and two-story, asymmetical Châteauesque style fieldstone dwelling. It features a circular stair tower with steep conical roof, irregularly placed stone chimneys, and multiple gables.
